com.zhukovsd.graphs.circular

Class CircularGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhukovsd.graphs.Graph<E>
      • com.zhukovsd.graphs.embedded.EmbeddedGraph<CircularVertex>
        • com.zhukovsd.graphs.circular.CircularGraph

  • public class CircularGraph
extends EmbeddedGraph<CircularVertex>
    Circular graph, composed of concentric circles and radial "spokes".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double centerFactor
      Multiplier for interval between center and 0th circle.
      (package private) double chordFactor
      Minimal ratio or chord, connecting 2 adjacent vertexes of same circle and radius of that circle.
      (package private) int circleCount
      Number of concentric circles in graph

      • Fields inherited from class com.zhukovsd.graphs.Graph

        reverseEdgesMap, vertexList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CircularGraph(int circleCount, double centerFactor, double chordFactor)
      Create circular graph, composed of concentric circles and radial "spokes", which connects vertexes with same angular coordinate.

    • Field Detail

      • circleCount

        int circleCount
        Number of concentric circles in graph

      • centerFactor

        double centerFactor
        Multiplier for interval between center and 0th circle.

      • chordFactor

        double chordFactor
        Minimal ratio or chord, connecting 2 adjacent vertexes of same circle and radius of that circle. The less factor is, the denser "spokes" are arranged. Outer circles has greater radius then inner, so outer circles has more vertexes on it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircularGraph

        public CircularGraph(int circleCount,
                     double centerFactor,
                     double chordFactor)
        Create circular graph, composed of concentric circles and radial "spokes", which connects vertexes with same angular coordinate. Create circular graph, composed by given circleCount concentric circles, with interval from center to 0th circle equals to centerFactor default intervals between circles, and
        Parameters:
        circleCount - concentric circle count
        centerFactor - factor for interval from center to 0th circle (interval = centerFactor * default radius between circles)
        chordFactor - factor defining number of vertexes on circle by it's index (described in getVertexCountByCircle(int)

    • Method Detail

      • getVertexCountByCircle

        private int getVertexCountByCircle(int index)
        Get vertex count for given concentric circle index. Outer circles composed of greater vertexes number then inner. Vertex count may be only power of 2, vertexes on all vertexes forms "spokes". "Spoke" connect vertexes with same angular coordinate.
        Parameters:
        index - given circle index
        Returns:
        vertex count for given circle index
